rituals.name: Soft Landing — TS-00004
rituals.plain:
weight: Place hand on chest. Set 60 seconds. Start now.
descent: Soften the belly. Make it easy. Remove one blocker.
discharge: Dump the loop. Stay for 3 minutes. Stop at timer.
Check body. Rinse with water. Return once.
Do one more. Do one small chore. Keep it small.
Close gently. Close the note. Mark next time.
Why: A soft descent turns heaviness into release.
rituals.safety: If this feels too intense, stop and return to a neutral task.

discharge: Sit heavy on chair. Set 2 minutes. Start now.
gravity: Exhale and descend. Make it easy. Remove one blocker.
weight: Write for 2 minutes. Stay for 5 minutes. Stop at timer.
Check body. Drink slowly. Return once.
Do one more. Take a short walk. Keep it small.
Close gently. Mark the landing. Mark next time.
Why: Small lifts rebuild capacity without forcing.
rituals.safety: If this feels too intense, stop and return to a neutral task.
